product_name: BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter - Fits Peg Perego Seats
long_description: Easily take your infant from car to BOB stroller with this BOB Infant car seat adapter, allowing infant to remain in the compatible Peg Perego infant car seat for ultimate convenience! Fits Peg Perego(R) Primo Viaggio SIP 30/30 seats. Easy to install and remove, and folds with the stroller; restraint belt secures infant car seat in place. Works with current single-child BOB strollers, including Revolution SE, Revolution CE, Stroller Strides, Sport Utility Stroller and Ironman models. Because of the higher center of gravity it creates, the BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter is intended for walking use only. BOB recommends that you consult with your pediatrician regarding the suitability of stroller use with your child as each child develops at a different rate.
short_description: Easily take your infant from car to BOB stroller with this BOB Infant car seat adapter, allowing infant to remain in the compatible Peg Perego infant car seat for ultimate convenience!
